title: [Question] Will KCET 2nd round students will have a new batch or do we have to copeup with first students?
content: Will 2nd round kcet have new batch?

comments.body: You will have a new section having students who joined through the second round; As only an orientation program is going on for the new joiners, you won't have to copeup much; You will have all exams at the same time as other joiner's, so if you are lagging they might speed it up or have special classes and cover it
Will it be a single section or multiple section(as per previous year)..?
Multiple, during our time there were around 3 sections.

Ok Bro btw The final result is coming Tommorow 
 will the college start from sep 8( i.e 2nd week of sept)...?
If the admissions of all students are over by that time then yes; If no it will start the next day after all admissions are done.
You will also have a seperate section but will have to catch up more, but isa will be at same time for all of you
